page.title: 11Camp site workers in Wroxall
page.content: Wroxall campsite is in Appuldurcombe Road.A lot of people go there on holiday.There is a pub,a swimming pool,a shop which sells food and toys and there is a laundrette.Most of all there are the caravans.They are cleaned every day by different people. There is room for people to take their own tents and camp.I wrote a letter to see if we could ask some people some questions,the manager said" yes" so one playtime we went down there. We found out that 9 people work there,5 part-time and 5 full-time. 4 people work there all year. There are two cleaners,1 cleaning supervisor,1 receptionist/secretary and 2 maintenance workers.1 person works at the burger bar.Most people say they like their job because they like working with the campers.
